summary: A new merchant for your home in Whiterun
descriptionHtml:
This mod will add a new NPC merchant to your home in Whiterun plus a little wood elf thief follower to help you with your adventure.

You can sell anything to Solara and you can find her having a variety of things. She will be able to sell/buy from 8 am to 8 pm.

I recommend to enable it after you purchase the house in Whiterun.

Requirements: none ( well, the house in Whiterun)

Compatibility : its compatible with all mods as far as i know.

Future update : she will be available to the house in Solitude and in the house of Windhelm


PS. in case they have grey faces i have included in the file their face textures. Just copy-paste them in data/textures/actor/Character/Facegendata/Facetint/

Credits: Bethesda Studios for the creation kit
author: N1m1k
